name: Story of a chicken
description:
It's a game about a chicken's life.

You can choose to decide its ending.

A game designed by Ziyuan Wang, Fuxin Liu, Mengyuan Li

Dialogue Design: Fuxin Liu, Mengyuan Li, Ziyuan Wang

Scene Design: Fuxin Liu

Character Design: Ziyuan Wang, Mengyuan Li

Coding: Ziyuan Wang
